name: cf-worker-ws-dev
description: A Cloudflare Worker-based VLESS proxy with WebSocket transport. Modular architecture for easy maintenance.

scripts.obfuscate: npm run bundle && javascript-obfuscator dist/bundle.js --output _worker.js --compact true --identifier-names-generator hexadecimal --rename-globals true --string-array true --string-array-threshold 1 --string-array-encoding base64 --transform-object-keys true --seed 0
